WE KEEP CONVEYORS GOING - ONE SYSTEM AT A TIME 



Unified Supply delivers Exceptional Support to customers by providing replacement parts for various brands in the baggage conveyor industry, refurbishing legacy carousels, and manufacturing new conveyor equipment, including Slope and Flat Plate carousels. 











 
learn more











4.9 out of 5 stars from 47 reviews 




★★★★★ 4.7/5 























OUR SOLUTIONS 



ONE BROKEN CONVEYOR IS ALL IT TAKES TO CREATE TOTAL CHAOS. And you know exactly what that means: massive baggage pileups, delayed and canceled flights, and extremely unhappy passengers. SAVE TIME AND MONEY—AND MAJOR HEADACHES—WITH THE RIGHT FIX FOR YOUR BAGGAGE CONVEYOR SYSTEM. 










 
Get in touch


























REPLACEMENT PARTS 



Get replacement parts fast with the fastest industry shipping time. We provide all key components used on all Baggage Carousel and Conveyor types. Extend the lifespan of your equipment and reduce breakdowns. 



















REFURBISHMENT/REBUILD OF CAROUSELS 



Reset your baggage carousel to MILE ZERO with a custom refurbishment. Instead of scrapping your legacy baggage system, consider turning back the “odometer” with a custom-engineered replacement solution. By refurbishing your existing carousel, you can save money, reduce downtime, and gain several efficiency improvements. 



















NEW EQUIPMENT 



Equipment Designed to Last. We designed our equipment for ease of use, maintenance, and long life-cycles. Make a smart equipment acquisition decision with consultant-approved products from Unified Supply. We proudly meet all Build America, Buy America (BABA) criteria by sourcing US-made steel, engineering, and manufacturing from our facility in Texas.

Our Purpose - to help keep your world going 



Unified Supply is in the solutions business. We work with you to put an engineered solution in place that makes sense in your budget cycle, whether it’s replacement parts, a refurbishment of your existing carousel, or a new system. Our goal is to make your life easier by maximizing your uptime, extending the life of your equipment, and saving you money. We know that not every budget is the same and not every problem requires a complete overhaul or start-from-scratch design. That’s why we’ve spent the past 28 years helping airports solve their unique baggage conveyor system challenges with only what they need—and nothing they don’t. Trust Unified Supply to save you time and money (and major headaches) with the right fix to keep your conveyors going. 







 
About Us



















Celebrating 28 Years in Business!
 



Unified Supply has been satisfying customer demands since 1996 using hard work, focus and a passion for solving problems.     



Here's how we do it 



We listen to your concerns.We evaluate the operation of each carousel unit within your existing baggage system.We help you understand your failure risks and create a customized solution to increase the efficiency of your system and prevent future breakdowns. 






 




							Customer Focused						










 




							Quick replies						











 
 Get in touch
